entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent had an alcohol use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had a marijuana use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had a cocaine use disorder in the past year.
Refers to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 5th edition, used as criteria for various disorders.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent experienced alcohol use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent experienced marijuana use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent experienced cocaine use disorder in the past year.
Relates the substance use disorder to the criteria outlined in the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 5th edition.
